channel.title: Seasonal/Holiday Cosmetic Ideas
channel.description:
>Notes: With my suggestion: All of my Cosmetic Armours will be **RENTABLE** for free but only for the duration of the holiday season/event time. Buy with GP and keep **FOREVER** >**Tier 1**: Low Price | Between 500-800 GP **Tier 2**: Medium Price | Between 1500-2000 GP **Tier 3**: High Price | Between 4000-6000 GP
**Halloween - 23rd Oct -> 5th Nov** **[u]Castle:[/u]** Spider webs in the corners, pumpkins around the room. A lit pyre in the center of the table. Rats crawling around. Each room is spookified with mist.
**[u]Exclusive Cosmetics:[/u]** Weapons: Tier 1: _Scythe Attack_ - Basic Scythe attack on another player Tier 2: _Pet Zombie_ - Use a Zombie to attack a player Tier 3: _Beheading Axe_ - Behead a player and place a pumpkin on the stump (shows in grave)
Clothing: Tier 1: Dracula's Robe - Count Dracula's robe. No special effects. Just a robe Tier 2: Zombie Outfit - Zombie outfit with eyeballs hanging from the head Tier 3: _Grim's Cloak_ - The Reaper's cloak which has a misty effect when he's on trial
**Christmas - 18th Dec -> Dec 31st** **[u]Castle:[/u]** Tree with presents in the 4 corners, each decorated to symbolize BD, Unseen, Cult and Neutrals. Each room has stockings somewhere and the King's Throne has Santa sat on it.
**[u]Exclusive Cosmetics:[/u]** Weapons: Tier 1: _Snowball_ - Throw a load snowballs at another player. Tier 2: _Reindeer Whip_ - Whip a player, causing a stampede of Reindeer to crush a player Tier 3: _Christmas Present Bomb_ - Give somebody a christmas present which explodes in their hands.
Clothing: Tier 1: _Elf Outfit_ - Just a little Green elf at court. Nothing spectacular. Tier 2: _Christmas Tree Outfit - Come to court dressed as a Christmas tree! Tier 3: _Santa Outfit_ - Santa has arrived in Castle Adiart, followed by a jingle sound whenever he's on trial
**Valentines - 5th Feb -> 18th Feb** **[u]Castle:[/u]** Hearts on the walls, the throne is shaped like a heart. Blood in executions replaced with heart shaped candy. Rooms are all decorated with valentines day cards.
**[u]Exclusive Cosmetics:[/u]** _Big Hug_ - Give somebody a big hug, so big that it crushes their bones. _Cupid Outfit_ - Cupid has arrived in Castle Adiart, with his diaper and wings. Hearts surround him when on trial.
**Easter - 26 Mar -> 15 Apr** **[u]Castle:[/u]** Easter eggs on the table and around the room. Easter bunny on the Throne. All rooms have chocolate and easter eggs semi-eaten.
**[u]Exclusive Cosmetics:[/u]** Weapons: Tier 1: _Egg Bomb_ - Throw an egg at someone that explodes in their face Tier 2: _Carrot_ - Impale somebody with a carrot Tier 3: _Chocolate Wand_ - Turn someone into a chocolate egg and eat them.
Clothes: Tier 1: _Saint Peter_ - Come to Court as Saint Peter! Tier 2: _Nothing..._ Tier 3: _Easter Bunny_ - Become the Easter Bunny, who dances when on trial
**Summer - 5th June -> 16th July** **[u]Cosmetics:[/u]**
Clothes: Tier 1: _Male and Female Swimwear_ Tier 2: _Male and Female Lifeguard outfit_
Weapon: Tier 3: _Beachball_ - Throw a beachball at somebody, which turns into a big spiky beachball
_**Other Events:**_
**April Fools Cosmetics:** Clothing: Tier 3: Fool Outfit - Laughs when on trial Weapon: Tier 2: Trollbox Bomb - Throw a box bomb at someone
**St Patricks Day Cosmetics:** Clothing: Tier 3: Leprechaun Outfit - Morris Dances when on trial Weapon: Tier 2: Shalalee - Bludgeon someone to death
**New Years:** Clothing: Tier 1: Modern Day Outfit with Hat that has the year printed on it Weapon: Tier 2: Firework - Shoot a firework at a player, exploding in front of them
**ToL Release Anniversary:** Clothing: Free: Golden Knight Armour with a Number engraved into it (To show 1 year Anniversary) - Available for that week only Weapon: Tier 3: Teemo - Scratches the player to death

item.description:
I would say tier three should be 3000-4000 in my opinion as it would be harder to earn, but the other prices seem reasonable.

Though final question, are the weapons and cosmetics only able to be bought during the season? This is why I would have bumped the prices down slightly for tier three

item.title: Seasonal/Holiday Cosmetic Ideas
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Only one thing. Would the cosmetics have to be bought with GP, or will everyone have a chance to access the executions or costumes if they wish?

If they have to be bought and the other people cannot afford it but show interest with like a vote to wear cosmetic button in the lobby, a person or two will be able have the executions or the costume.

This may sound daft I know, but then depending how much the cosmetics and executions cost, they may not be able to get them. Or will the be a bit like the Alpha and Beta games, where the people can rent them for around 50GP and get to keep them for a week or two after the event so they are bale to have a bit of time with it still if they didn’t have a chance to go on trial and see the costumes for themselves or make their own executions.

All in all, it sounds like a fun idea. Well, if the devs decide to do this that is. Otherwise Plex, I feel like you hammered the nail on the head!
